project.description: This is a bit of a rare project. It is only meant to generate a jar file with the file services.xml in the META-INF directory. Then the file copied manually in this location: /geonetwork-web-ebrim/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/services/ which will result in this: /geonetwork-web-ebrim/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/services/geonetwork-services-def-ebrim-3.0.0.jar Note: Axis2 uses the aar extension for this kind of files, but it works with the jar extension as well.
